oneOf.description: In case of AnonCred credential format, an array of attribute is requested in the proof definition.

In case of JSON-LD credential format, an array of attribute is requested in the proof definition. Dot notation is used to refer nested properties within the json-ld structure (e.g., "issuedToParty.name").
